roleset.name: belong with or at, going to
roleset.note: ATTEND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'attend' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. (from attend.01-v)

example.name: attend school
example.text: Even though he is nearly 25, John still attends kindergarten.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Some 500 investors representing investor clubs from around the U.S. were attending when the market started to slide Friday.
example.arg: Some 500 investors representing investor clubs from around the U.S.
when the market started to slide Friday

example.name: come along with
example.text: While many problems would attend a restructuring of Columbia, investors say Mr. Spiegel is mulling such a plan to mitigate Columbia's junk problems.

roleset.name: pay close attention to, attend to
roleset.note: ATTEND-V NOTES: Added by Julia for unification (from attend.02-v)
ATTENDING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to attention.01. Fits with VN class peer-30.3. Framed by Katie. (from attending.01-n)
ATTENTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Corresponds to VNcls peer-30.3. (from attention.01-n)

example.name: just arg0
example.text: There 's a lot -- well , by linguistics standards , a lot -- of money floating around for doing exactly this , and it sounds like Mosuo is one language that might be saveable if you can bring it to the attention of the appropriate professionals .

example.name: both args
example.text: He was attentive to her needs
